name: api_ui_GUILayout
description: The GUILayout class is the interface for Unity gui with automatic layout. Unlike the standard GUI class which requires manual coordinates, GUILayout arranges controls based on their content and container.

properties.name: BeginArea
properties.description: Begin a GUILayout block of GUI controls in a fixed screen area.

properties.name: BeginHorizontal
properties.description: Begin a Horizontal control group.

properties.name: BeginScrollView
properties.description: Begin an automatically laid out scrollview.

properties.name: BeginVertical
properties.description: Begin a vertical control group.

properties.name: Box
properties.description: Make an auto-layout box.

properties.name: Button
properties.description: Make a single press button.

properties.name: EndArea
properties.description: Close a GUILayout block started with BeginArea.

properties.name: EndHorizontal
properties.description: Close a group started with BeginHorizontal.

properties.name: EndScrollView
properties.description: End a scroll view begun with a call to BeginScrollView.

properties.name: EndVertical
properties.description: Close a group started with BeginVertical.

properties.name: ExpandHeight
properties.description: Option passed to a control to allow or disallow vertical expansion.

properties.name: ExpandWidth
properties.description: Option passed to a control to allow or disallow horizontal expansion.

properties.name: FlexibleSpace
properties.description: Insert a flexible space element.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Option passed to a control to give it an absolute height.

properties.name: HorizontalScrollbar
properties.description: Make a horizontal scrollbar.

properties.name: HorizontalSlider
properties.description: A horizontal slider the user can drag to change a value between a min and a max.

properties.name: Label
properties.description: Make an auto-layout label.

properties.name: MaxHeight
properties.description: Option passed to a control to specify a maximum height.

properties.name: MaxWidth
properties.description: Option passed to a control to specify a maximum width.

properties.name: MinHeight
properties.description: Option passed to a control to specify a minimum height.
